mapper.sql: user_id, username, password, nick_name, user_type, email, phone_number, sex, avatar_path, user_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remark

user.user_id AS userId,user.username AS username,user.password,user.nick_name AS nickName,user.user_type AS userType,user.email,user.phone_number AS phoneNumber,user.sex,user.avatar_path AS avatarPath,user.user_status AS userStatus,user.create_by AS createBy,user.create_date AS createDate,user.update_by AS updateBy,user.update_date AS updateDate,user.del_flag AS delFlag,user.remark

role.role_id AS roleId,role.role_name AS roleName,role.role_key AS roleKey,role.role_status AS roleStatus,role.create_by AS createBy,role.create_date AS createDate,role.update_by AS updateBy,role.update_date AS updateDate,role.del_flag AS delFlag,role.remark

gr.user_group_id AS userGroupId,gr.user_group_name AS userGroupName,gr.create_by AS createBy,gr.create_date AS createDate,gr.update_by AS updateBy,gr.update_date AS updateDate,gr.del_flag AS delFlag,gr.remark
